category.name: Manufacturing

preference.name: METimeSystemFieldMappingDataset
preference.preference_description: Specifies the dataset containing the XML mapping file between time system fields and activity properties. The value of each field in the mapping file is applied to the corresponding property whenever data is copied from the time system to Teamcenter. A valid value must have the format "name:type:reference", where "name" specifies the name of the dataset, "type" the dataset type, and "reference" the reference of the file.
